attributes.action: ... regard UK overpopluation as the source of environmental problems and hence to act towards a decrease in population.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Fewer people in the UK would have less negative impact on our environment. Community spirit would start to re-emerge. Increased research should go towards determining what the Sustainable Population figure should be and how it could be humanely achieved.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "regard UK overpopluation as the source of environmental problems and hence to act towards a decrease in population."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.number10.gov.uk/Page21815


Prime Minister's Office
